item.title: Writing technical content in Academic
item.description: Academic is designed to give technical content creators a seamless experience. You can focus on the content and Academic handles the rest. Highlight your code snippets, take notes on math classes, and draw diagrams from textual representation. On this page, you'll find some examples of the types of technical content that can be rendered with Academic. Examples Code Academic supports a Markdown extension for highlighting code syntax. You can enable this feature by toggling the highlight option in your config/_default/params.
